!!MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm

Mogwai ERDesigner (http://mogwai.sourceforge.net/erdesigner/erdesigner.html" )
is a tool for modeling and visualizing database structures as entity relationship model (ER or ERM). 
It uses *.xdm files ("xml database model") a XML-based file format.

XSD3b can read MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm *.xdm files with the XSD3bXSLT - Xsd3bPlugin and the xsl-transformation 
	* Mogwai _ ERDesignerModel.xdm.xsd3b.xsl
---
see also
	* Xsd3bPlugin
	* XSD3bXSLT
	* MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm
